imgHero.alt: Ready to help you in every step

tp_pw_hero.hero_title: Ready to help you in every step

tp_pw_articleBlock.article_text: From idea to launch – and beyond. Let us help you integrate and manage the whole value chain of processing and packaging through our complete solutions for food and beverages, expertise and innovations. We are ready to increase efficiency, optimize performance and secure food quality – in a sustainable way. With us as your trusted partner, business will become easier.

img.alt: Complete solutions - Ensure efficiency and quality

tp_pw_imageTextRight.article_text: Industry 4.0 is everything from robots and artificial intelligence to smart algorithms and self-driving cars. In this webinar we give you as a food manufacturer insights on Industry 4.0 and the opportunities that it brings.

Tetra Pak 2018 Sustainability Report is here​
Tetra Pak achieves 50% renewable electricity consumption
Tetra Pak revitalises organic milk for Mengniu

content.title: Sustainability Report 2018
content.text: Did you know that 72 million children in 58 countries received milk or other nutritious beverages in Tetra Pak packages during 2017? In our sustainability report you will learn more about the progress within Protecting Food, People and Futures – the pillars of our sustainability work.

imgText.alt: How well do you know the millennials?

tp_pw_imageText.container_title: How well do you know the millennials?
tp_pw_imageText.article_text: Young, aspirational and demanding. They spend approximately $600 billion annually. But who are the millennials? How can you optimise your products and packages to meet their needs?

tp_pw_articles.container_title: From idea to launch and improvements

tp_pw_article_col.article_text: Do you want big particles, high viscosity or a perfectly smooth mouthfeel? Batch or continuous? Either way you get best practice in terms of food safety, efficiency, product quality and environmental performance. We give you new ways to move forward with your business. Together we turn challenges into success.

Protect your food and beverages in the very best way. We offer you the most attractive and complete carton packaging range for consuming fresh and safe products. All our packages provide consumer convenience, easy opening, optimal shelf life – and the ability to stand out and give your brand maximum exposure.

Our services offer is not just about fixing something that's broken. It's about preventing breakdown and protecting investments. We cover every aspect of your food production. Our tailored service solutions improve performance, optimise costs and ensure food safety throughout the lifecycle of your operation.
tp_pw_article_col.btnText: How our services improve your business
